hero.title: Transform Your Restaurant with Digital Menus
hero.subtitle: Modern, Interactive, and Easy to Manage
hero.description: Say goodbye to printed menus and hello to a seamless digital experience. Update your menu in real-time, showcase stunning food images, and delight your customers.

benefits.title: Why Choose Digital Menus?
benefits.subtitle: Discover the advantages that will revolutionize your restaurant

cost_effective.title: Cost Effective
cost_effective.description: Save money on printing costs and menu updates. Make changes instantly without reprinting.

easy_updates.title: Easy Updates
easy_updates.description: Update prices, add new dishes, or remove items in seconds from any device.

visual_appeal.title: Visual Appeal
visual_appeal.description: Showcase your dishes with high-quality images that make customers hungry.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Serve international customers with menus in multiple languages.

analytics.title: Smart Analytics
analytics.description: Track popular dishes and customer preferences to optimize your menu.

eco_friendly.title: Eco-Friendly
eco_friendly.description: Reduce paper waste and contribute to a sustainable environment.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your digital menu

qr_code.title: QR Code Access
qr_code.description: Customers scan and view your menu instantly on their phones.

real_time.title: Real-Time Updates
real_time.description: Changes appear immediately across all customer devices.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Match your brand with custom colors, fonts, and layouts.

responsive.title: Mobile Optimized
responsive.description: Perfect viewing experience on all devices and screen sizes.

categories.title: Smart Categories
categories.description: Organize your menu with categories and filters for easy navigation.

allergens.title: Allergen Info
allergens.description: Display allergen information and dietary options clearly.

step1.title: Create Your Menu
step1.description: Add your dishes, prices, and images through our easy-to-use dashboard.

step2.title: Generate QR Code
step2.description: Get your unique QR code and place it on tables or at the entrance.

step3.title: Start Serving
step3.description: Customers scan and enjoy browsing your beautiful digital menu.

cta_section.title: Ready to Go Digital?
cta_section.description: Join thousands of restaurants already using digital menus to enhance customer experience.

auth.store-registration: Easily register your restaurant and start using our digital menu platform today.
auth.enter-store-description: Enter a brief description of your restaurant
auth.please-login: Please login to your account to continue.
auth.login-description: Access your restaurant dashboard and manage your digital menu with ease.
auth.enter-credentials: Enter your credentials to access your account.
auth.start-your-journey: Start your restaurant's digital journey with us today!
auth.register-description: Join our platform and revolutionize your restaurant with a digital menu solution.
auth.fill-details: Please fill in the details to create your restaurant account.
auth.confirm-password-description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
auth.reset-password-description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
auth.resend-verification-email-description: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
auth.verify-email-description: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
auth.name: Name
auth.password-min: Password must be at least 8 characters

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.manage-categories-desc: Easily add, edit, or remove meal categories to keep your menu organized and up-to-date.
dashboard.manage-meals-desc: Easily add, edit, or remove meals to keep your menu fresh and appealing.
dashboard.confirm-delete-category: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
dashboard.fill-category-details: Please fill in the category details
dashboard.fill-meal-details: Please fill in the meal details
dashboard.confirm-delete-meal: Are you sure you want to delete this meal?
dashboard.recent-orders-desc: View and manage your recent orders.
dashboard.wait-for-orders: Orders will appear here once customers start placing them.
dashboard.create-tables-qr: Add tables to generate unique QR codes for each.
dashboard.create-first-meal: Create your first meal to start selling.
dashboard.create-first-category: Create a category to organize your meals.

setting.page-description: Manage your application settings and configuration
setting.seo-description: Configure your site title, descriptions, and keywords in both languages
setting.title: Title
setting.currency-description: Configure currency display for different languages
setting.update-error: Failed to update settings. Please check the form.

common.upload-image: Click to upload or drag and drop

countries.title: Countries Management
countries.description: Create and manage countries for your restaurant
countries.fill-country-details: Please fill in the country details
countries.manage-countries-desc: Easily add, edit, or remove countries to keep your restaurant's location data accurate and up-to-date.
countries.confirm-delete-country: Are you sure you want to delete this country?

users.title: Users Management
users.try-different-search: Try a different search or check back later.
users.name: Name
users.confirm-delete-user: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

banner.discover-fresh-ingredients: Discover fresh ingredients and mouth-watering dishes crafted with love.
banner.page-description: Create and manage promotional banners for your restaurant
banner.add-description: Create an attractive banner for your homepage
banner.title: Banner Title
banner.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this banner?
banner.no-banners-description: Create your first banner to promote your restaurant specials
banner.leave-empty: Leave empty to keep current image

stores.title: Stores Management
stores.try-different-search: Try a different search or check back later.
stores.confirm-delete-store: Are you sure you want to delete this store? This action cannot be undone.
stores.fill-store-details: Please fill in the store details
stores.manage-stores-desc: Easily view, add, edit, or remove stores to keep your platform organized and up-to-date.
stores.confirm-delete-category: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This action cannot be undone.

roles.title: Roles Management
roles.description: Create and manage user roles and permissions
roles.confirm-delete-role: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.
roles.fill-role-details: Please fill in the role details
roles.manage-roles-desc: Easily add, edit, or remove roles to manage user permissions and access levels.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: Oops! We can't find that page
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.

403.title: Access Denied
403.subtitle: You don't have permission
403.description: Sorry, you don't have the necessary permissions to access this page. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

500.title: Server Error
500.subtitle: Something went wrong
500.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to fix the issue. Please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.subtitle: We'll be back soon
503.description: Our service is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or high traffic. We're working hard to restore service as quickly as possible.
